title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), overwriting the exported jar file for the second time results in an out of sync message.
EB: The system should allow for the successful overwriting of the exported jar file without causing an out of sync message.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Export a directory (project).
2. Place the exported jar in the same directory (project).
3. Overwrite the exported jar file.
4. Repeat step 3 for the second time.
